elements.name: To upload a file using karate framework

steps.name: multipart file file = { read:'garbage.txt', filename:'garbage.txt', contentType: 'multipart/form-data' }
comments: # 'multipart file' is the keyword provided by karate
# Here another file used is the parameter name provided by api developer
